summary:
Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Shankar's Ram Charan film sees dip in collections

Date: Jan 11, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Shankar’s new film Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, collected ₹17.92 crore on its second day, bringing its total to ₹68.92 crore amid stiff competition during the festival season.

  • The film was released on January 10 and has received mixed reviews.
  • It is competing with other notable Sankranthi releases.
  • Despite high expectations, the occupancy rates were only decent compared to previous works by Shankar.
“Game Changer had high expectations but now faces stiff competition from newly released films.”

This film showcases Ram Charan in dual roles as an IAS officer and an activist, portraying significant political themes in its narrative.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 2: Ram Charan's Film Sees a Dip

title: Manisha Koirala opens up about whether she misses having a companion in life: 'Who said I don’t have one? - TOI Etimes
summary:
Manisha Koirala opens up about whether she misses having a companion in life: 'Who said I don’t have one?'

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

In a recent interview, Manisha Koirala shared her thoughts on companionship, life fulfillment, and her experiences post-cancer.

  • Koirala humorously negated the idea that she misses having a companion, asserting, 'Who said I don’t have one?'
  • She emphasized her desire not to settle for less than she deserves in a relationship.
  • Koirala believes that if a true companion is meant to be, it will naturally happen.
  • She values her current freedom, fulfillment, and the choices in her life.
  • Manisha continues to captivate audiences with her performances, recently starring in Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar.
“If a companion could enhance my life, I would be happy, but I don’t wish to change my present situation.”

Manisha Koirala is content with her life’s quality, remaining open to companionship without compromising what she cherishes.
newTitle: Manisha Koirala opens up about companionship in her life

title: Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Ram Charan-Shankar film to beat Indian 2 lifetime? - Hindustan Times
summary:
Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Shankar's Ram Charan, Kiara Advani-starrer seems to fare better than his Kamal Haasan-starrer.

Publication Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The film Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has performed better than expected, earning ₹15.47 crore on its second day.

  • Released on January 10, Game Changer collected a total of ₹66.47 crore by the end of its second day.
  • It had a lower occupancy rate compared to other language versions, with a peak of 36.09% in the evening.
  • Game Changer is projected to compete with other upcoming Sankranthi releases for audience attention.
Shankar’s previous film, Indian 2, collected ₹25.6 crore on its opening day.

In conclusion, while Game Changer has made a strong debut, it faces significant competition from other films released during the festive season.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Update: Day 2 Collection Insights

title: Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief In Fan's Death Case, Court Lists Down Relaxations For Pushpa 2 Actor - News18
summary:
Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief In Fan's Death Case

Date: January 11, 2025 Source: News18

Allu Arjun received significant legal relaxations in connection with the Pushpa 2 stampede case, alleviating some conditions previously imposed on him after his arrest last month.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested in relation to a stampede incident that occurred at the Pushpa 2 premiere, which resulted in a woman's death and injuries to a child.
  • The Nampally court has exempted him from appearing at the Chikkadapally police station every Sunday for security reasons.
  • He has also been granted permission to travel abroad.

"The crowd went out of control after Allu Arjun stepped out of his car to greet fans attending the premiere," stated a source close to the incident.

This legal development comes after Allu Arjun was previously remanded to judicial custody and then granted interim bail.
newTitle: Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief in Fan's Death Case

title: ‘Tiku Talsania is doing well and is under observation after falling ill’: Rashami Desai - Hindustan Times
summary:
Rashami Desai Provides Update on Tiku Talsania's Health After Hospitalization

Date: Jan 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

After attending a film screening in Mumbai, actor Tiku Talsania fell ill and is now hospitalized. Rashami Desai, who met him shortly before he fell ill, provided an update on his condition.

  • Tiku Talsania experienced discomfort at a film screening and was hospitalized.
  • Rashami Desai stated that he is under observation and in a better space surrounded by loved ones.
  • Initial reports suggested a heart attack, but it was clarified that he suffered a brain stroke.
  • Tiku is known for roles in various popular films, predominantly in comedic roles.
“He was fine when I met him... He is under observation at the moment,” - Rashami Desai.

This incident highlights the sudden health issues that can arise, and fans are encouraged to pray for Tiku’s speedy recovery.
newTitle: Rashami Desai Provides Update on Tiku Talsania's Health After Hospitalization

title: Tiku Talsania critical; actor has suffered a brain stroke, admitted to Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospita - TOI Etimes
summary:
Tiku Talsania critical after brain stroke, hospitalized

Date: Not specified, Source: Times of India

Tiku Talsania, renowned for his comic roles, has been admitted to Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital after suffering a brain stroke. Initial reports erroneously suggested a heart attack was the cause.

  • Tiku Talsania suffered a brain stroke while attending a special screening of a Gujarati film.
  • Industry veteran Rajesh Vasani witnessed the incident and reported on his condition.
  • Talsania has previously spoken about his experiences in the film industry, particularly with Mahesh Bhatt.
  • His latest project, 'Vaar Tahevaar', features Talsania in a comical role.
Rajesh Vasani: "He vomited there, and people around him took him to Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital."

The entertainment industry is rallying support for Talsania as he battles this critical condition.
newTitle: Tiku Talsania critical after brain stroke, hospitalized

title: Tiku Talsania Suffers A Heart Attack, 70-Year-Old Actor Hospitalised In Mumbai | Exclusive - News18
summary:
Tiku Talsania Suffers A Heart Attack, 70-Year-Old Actor Hospitalised In Mumbai

Date: January 11, 2025

Source: News18

Actor Tiku Talsania suffered a massive heart attack on January 10 and is currently hospitalized in Mumbai. The 70-year-old actor is known for his performances in popular comedy films.

  • Tiku Talsania has been hospitalized at Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital in Mumbai.
  • He is renowned for movies like Andaz Apna Apna, Ishq, and Partner.
  • Tiku has also worked in various television shows and was last seen in a 2023 Gujarati series.
  • Details about his health condition are still awaited.
“I am slightly jobless right now. I want to work, but the right kinds of roles are not coming my way.”

The entertainment industry is hoping for a quick recovery for the well-loved actor, known for bringing joy to audiences.
newTitle: Tiku Talsania Suffers A Heart Attack, 70-Year-Old Actor Hospitalised In Mumbai

Honey Singh Millionaire India Tour 2025: Check Dates, Cities, How To Book Tickets And More - News24
summary:
Honey Singh Millionaire India Tour 2025

Date & Source: January 11, 2025, News24

Global artiste Honey Singh’s comeback to the music world was the biggest headline of 2024 with the release of his album ‘Glory’. The hit song ‘Millionaire’ now leads him to tour major cities across India, promising an unforgettable musical experience.

Key Points

  • The tour kicks off in Mumbai on February 22, covering 10 cities including Lucknow, Delhi, Indore, Pune, Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Jaipur, and Kolkata.
  • Tickets go live for booking on January 11, 2 pm via District app by Zomato.
  • The concert is a 4-hour event aimed at audiences aged 16 and above, starting at 6 pm.
  • Singh's performances are expected to feature surprises and a significantly upgraded experience compared to his previous shows.
“Millionaire Tour is not just a tour, ye meri kahani hai jise abb main aap sabke saath jeeyunga.” - Honey Singh

Conclusion: Honey Singh aims to redefine live performance expectations in India with his upcoming tour, ensuring fans are in for a treat with new and innovative experiences.
newTitle: Honey Singh Millionaire India Tour 2025: Dates, Cities, and Ticket Booking Details

title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection (37 Days): Allu Arjun’s Magnum Opus Enjoys 149% Returns, Inches Away From Super-Hit Verdict! - Koimoi
summary:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection (37 Days): Allu Arjun’s Magnum Opus Enjoys 149% Returns

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2 has slowed down at the Indian box office following the release of Game Changer, impacting collections in Telugu states.

  • The film was released in five languages: Telugu, Hindi, Tamil, Malayalam, and Kannada.
  • As of day 37, Pushpa 2 has earned a total of 1246.62 crore at the Indian box office.
  • The Hindi-dubbed version has been crucial for continued earnings.
  • Reported ROI is 746.62 crore, amounting to 149.32% returns.
  • A total of 500 crores was reportedly spent on making the film.
“To be a super-hit, a film needs to make 150% returns at the Indian box office.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 is poised to achieve super-hit status as it approaches the critical 1250 crore mark needed for 150% returns.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection (37 Days): Allu Arjun’s Magnum Opus Enjoys 149% Returns

summary:

Tiku Talsania, the veteran actor, has been hospitalized after suffering a heart attack, and his condition is currently critical.

  • He attended a movie premiere just days before his hospitalization.
  • Talsania is well-known for his roles in iconic films and television shows dating back to 1984.

summary:

Pushpa 2 continues to dominate the box office, earning impressive collections even after 37 days. This update provides an overview of its performance and comparisons with other major films.

  • Pushpa 2’s 37-day total in the domestic market is 821.15 crores net.

title: Aamir Khan quits smoking: When he said his cigarette smoke affected ex-wife Kiran Rao, but she wasn't ‘averse’ to pipe - Hindustan Times
summary:
Aamir Khan Quits Smoking Ahead of Son's Film Release

Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Aamir Khan announced on January 11, 2025, that he has quit smoking in preparation for his son Junaid Khan's film, Loveyapa. He explained that he has previously struggled with smoking but is committed to supporting his son during his career launch.

  • Aamir Khan recently quit smoking for his son's film release.
  • He had switched from cigarettes to pipe smoking a few years ago.
  • Kiran Rao, Aamir's ex-wife, was affected by his cigarette smoking but was not averse to pipe smoking.
  • Aamir has had a long history with smoking and has tried cigars but did not enjoy them.
  • He feels a personal sacrifice is needed as a father to support his son.
“I quit smoking for two-three years when I was training for Dhoom 3. But then, I went back to it again.” - Aamir Khan

Aamir Khan's decision to quit smoking reflects his desire to enhance his role as a father as his son begins his film career.
newTitle: Aamir Khan Quits Smoking Ahead of Son's Film Release

title: Neena Gupta recalls when she and baby Masaba were left homeless after her aunt kicked them out: 'I had... - Moneycontrol
summary:
Neena Gupta recalls when she and baby Masaba were left homeless after her aunt kicked them out: 'I had nowhere to go with a baby...'

Date: January 11, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

Actress Neena Gupta opened up about a challenging time in her life when she and her infant daughter Masaba were kicked out by her aunt, leaving them homeless.

  • Neena Gupta recalled a period when she was financially strained after selling her home.
  • She temporarily moved in with her aunt while waiting to purchase a new place.
  • Her aunt unexpectedly kicked her out one night, leaving her with nowhere to go.
“I had no money left. There was this one night where I had nowhere to go with a baby,” Neena stated.

This heart-wrenching memory highlights Neena's resilience during one of the toughest times of her life.
newTitle: Neena Gupta Reflects on Being Homeless with Baby Masaba
